string.value: With a clouded look on his face, #p2012018# gave me a medicine called #t4031700# and a letter, asking me to deliver them to #b#p2111004##k. He seemed concerned that the medicine might not be enough to cure #p2111005#...
Despite receiving the medicine, #p2111004# still seemed very much concerned. #p2111005#'s illness might be a lot worse than I thought...
Good thing you came. The medicine is now ready. Hey, and this is a letter to #p2111004#. Please deliver this to her along with the medicine. You'll go to #m261000000# right now, right?

I tried my best, but honestly, I am not sure if that will be enough... I don't know if it will work for a special case like #p2111005#'s... I am not sure... anyway, please take the medicine and the letter and give them to #b#p2111004##k.
Hmm... I guess you are not interested in going back to #m261000000# yet. If so, then come see me again before heading back to #m261000000#.

Ah, hello traveler. Did you meet up with #p2012018#? Ahh, so this is the medicine he made for her. And the letter... I felt bad about not being able to contact my little brother for the longest time. I'm glad he found time to write this. I guess this will be enough to cure my daughter, right?
As long as #p2111005# gets healthy, I'll do anything. Now that my husband's missing, #p2111005# is all I've got.
You haven't gone to #b#p2111004##k yet? I am worried sick about my niece. Go now.
You haven't gone to see #b#p2012018##k yet? I am sure he'll set aside whatever he has to make a medicine for #p2111005#.

What....? You lost the items I gave you? Hey! That's the medicine for #p2111005#, and a letter I took time to write for my sister! Good thing I have a spare, so I'll give you another one, but don't lose it again!
